languages.text: "Как и ты, мотылек". {n}Ксенос указывает изувеченной конечностью в сторону Ирлиэт.{/n} "Если, конечно, тьма Комморры не сожжет тебя так же быстро, как остальных".
"Same as you, little moth." {n}The xenos points a mangled limb toward Yrliet.{/n} "Unless, of course, the darkness of Commorragh burns you as fast as the others."
languages.original_text: "Как и ты, мотылек". {n}Ксенос указывает изувеченной конечностью в сторону Ирлиэт.{/n} "Если, конечно, тьма Комморры не сожжет тебя так же быстро, как остальных".

languages.text: 「お前と同じだ、ちっぽけな蛾よ」{n}異種族は切り裂かれた手足をユリエットに向ける。{/n}「もちろん、コモラフの闇に焼かれでもしなければの話だが」
languages.original_text: "Same as you, little moth." {n}The xenos points a mangled limb toward Yrliet.{/n} "Unless, of course, the darkness of Commorragh burns you as fast as the others."

traits.locale_text: 「お前と同じだ、ちっぽけな蛾よ」{n}異種族は切り裂かれた手足をユリエットに向ける。{/n}「もちろん、コモラフの闇に焼かれでもしなければの話だが」

languages.text: “你也一样，小飞蛾。”{n}血伶人拿着一截残缺的肢体，指着伊莉耶特。{/n}“当然，如果科摩罗的黑暗也像吞噬其他人那样，很快吞噬了你，那就另当别论了。”
languages.original_text: "Same as you, little moth." {n}The xenos points a mangled limb toward Yrliet.{/n} "Unless, of course, the darkness of Commorragh burns you as fast as the others."

traits.locale_text: “你也一样，小飞蛾。”{n}血伶人拿着一截残缺的肢体，指着伊莉耶特。{/n}“当然，如果科摩罗的黑暗也像吞噬其他人那样，很快吞噬了你，那就另当别论了。”

languages.text: «Lo mismo que tú, pequeña polilla». {n}El xenos le señala un miembro destrozado a Yrliet.{/n} «A no ser que la oscuridad de Commorragh te queme tan rápido como al resto».
languages.original_text: "Same as you, little moth." {n}The xenos points a mangled limb toward Yrliet.{/n} "Unless, of course, the darkness of Commorragh burns you as fast as the others."

traits.locale_text: «Lo mismo que tú, pequeña polilla». {n}El xenos le señala un miembro destrozado a Yrliet.{/n} «A no ser que la oscuridad de Commorragh te queme tan rápido como al resto».

languages.text: "Ebenso, kleine Motte." {n}Der Xenos deutet mit einer verstümmelten Gliedmaße auf Yrliet.{/n} "Es sei denn natürlich, die Dunkelheit von Commorragh verbrennt Euch ebenso schnell wie die anderen."
languages.original_text: "Same as you, little moth." {n}The xenos points a mangled limb toward Yrliet.{/n} "Unless, of course, the darkness of Commorragh burns you as fast as the others."

traits.locale_text: "Ebenso, kleine Motte." {n}Der Xenos deutet mit einer verstümmelten Gliedmaße auf Yrliet.{/n} "Es sei denn natürlich, die Dunkelheit von Commorragh verbrennt Euch ebenso schnell wie die anderen."

languages.text: « Vous également, petit papillon de nuit, » {n}ajoute le xénos en pointant un membre déformé vers Yrliet.{/n} « À moins, bien sûr, que les ténèbres de Commorragh ne vous consument aussi vite que les autres. »
languages.original_text: "Same as you, little moth." {n}The xenos points a mangled limb toward Yrliet.{/n} "Unless, of course, the darkness of Commorragh burns you as fast as the others."

traits.locale_text: « Vous également, petit papillon de nuit, » {n}ajoute le xénos en pointant un membre déformé vers Yrliet.{/n} « À moins, bien sûr, que les ténèbres de Commorragh ne vous consument aussi vite que les autres. »

languages.text: "Aynı şey senin için de geçerli küçük güve." {n}Zeno, biçimi bozulmuş uzuvlarından biriyle Yrliet'i işaret ediyor.{/n} "Commorragh'ın karanlığı seni de diğerleri gibi hızla yakıp tüketmezse tabii."
languages.original_text: "Same as you, little moth." {n}The xenos points a mangled limb toward Yrliet.{/n} "Unless, of course, the darkness of Commorragh burns you as fast as the others."

traits.locale_text: "Aynı şey senin için de geçerli küçük güve." {n}Zeno, biçimi bozulmuş uzuvlarından biriyle Yrliet'i işaret ediyor.{/n} "Elbette Commorragh'ın karanlığı seni de diğerleri kadar hızla yakıp tüketmediği sürece."
